name: Dumpy Birds
description:
In an ordinary town. Where birds around him where being struck down by humans. One bird decided that enough was enough. "Toucan play at their game".

Take control of Dumpy Bird as you dump on the people below. Target the Hipster or Ye Olde Man or anybirdy else. Whoever you dump on it's a guaranteed craptasstic adventure. Beat your high score and you will have something to crow about!

YouTube Game Trailer

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bSFATvab3Yo

To view on play store

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com....
